Producer: Clint Eastwood, Steven Spielberg, Robert Lorenz
Production Co: Amblin Entertainment, Malpaso Company, Warner Bros., DreamWorks SKG
Synopsis: Long-buried missives from the island reveal the stories of the Japanese troops who fought and died there during World War II. Among them are Saigo (Kazunari Ninomiya), a baker; Baron Nishi (Tsuyoshi Ihara), an Olympic champion; and Shimizu (Ry√¥ Kase), an idealistic soldier. Though Lt. Gen. Tadamichi Kuribayashi (Ken Watanabe) knows he and his men have virtually no chance of survival, he uses his extraordinary military skills to hold off American troops as long as possible.
Title: Letters From Iwo Jima
